node.title: 'Allowing a coup to be staged': Prince Harry says he warned Twitter CEO about deadly assault on US Capitol
node.alt: Meghan and Harry, the Duke and Duchess of Sussex walk arm in arm
node.description: Prince Harry saysÂ he warned Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey via email that "his platform was allowing a coup to be staged" a day before the deadly assault on the US Capitol.
node.content:
["Prince Harry has said he warned Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey via email that \"his platform was allowing a coup to be staged\" a day before the deadly assault on the US Capitol by Donald Trump supporters.", "Harry was speaking by video on a panel called The Internet Lie Machine,\u00a0organised by US\u00a0technology and culture magazine WIRED.", "Addressing a panel hosted by WIRED's editor at large, Steven Levy, Harry called misinformation on social media a \"global humanitarian crisis\" that can have a \"devastating impact on the masses\".", "Asked if he had been given the chance to present his case to the heads of Facebook and Twitter, Harry responded: \"No, not directly, not personally\".", "\"Jack (Dorsey) and I were emailing each other prior to January 6, where I warned him that his platform was allowing a coup to be staged,\" he said.", "\"That email was sent the day before, and then it happened, and I haven't heard from him since.\"", "
Megxit term 'began with a troll'
", "Prince Harry also said that the term \"Megxit\",\u00a0a phrase used by the British press to describe the decision by him and his wife Meghan to quit their royal duties, was a misogynistic term.", "He said the word was an example of online and media hatred.", "\u201cMaybe people know this and maybe they don\u2019t, but the term Megxit was, or is, a misogynistic term,\" he said.", "\"But it began with a troll.\"", "A study released in October by social media analytics service Bot Sentinel identified 83 accounts on Twitter that it said were responsible for 70 per cent\u00a0of the hateful content and misinformation aimed at Meghan and Harry.", "", "
Harry and his wife Meghan moved to California last year to lead a more independent life.(Reuters: Caitlin Ochs)
", "Harry and his wife Meghan moved to California last year to lead a more independent life.", "Harry has said that part of the reason for their departure was the racist treatment of Meghan, whose mother is black and whose father is white, by the British tabloid media.", "Reuters"]
